mapper.select: SELECT /* ProgramID=MainMapper.selectMainDetail */ IDX , IMG_OG_NM , IMG_PATH , IMG_REAL_NM , SBJ_A , SBJ_B , SUB_SBJ , SUB_SBJ_YN , PERIOD , PERIOD_YN , LOCATION , LOCATION_YN , TARGET , TARGET_YN , CONTS , CONTS_YN , BENEFIT , BENEFIT_YN , NOTE , NOTE_YN FROM TB_MAIN_MGMT WHERE DEL_FLG = 'N' ORDER BY IDX DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* ProgramID=MainMapper.selectMainSkimDetail */ IDX , IMG_OG_NM , IMG_PATH , IMG_REAL_NM , SBJ_A , SBJ_B , SUB_SBJ , SUB_SBJ_YN , PERIOD , PERIOD_YN , LOCATION , LOCATION_YN , TARGET , TARGET_YN , CONTS , CONTS_YN , BENEFIT , BENEFIT_YN , NOTE , NOTE_YN FROM TB_MAIN_MGMT WHERE DEL_FLG = 'N' AND SKIM_YN = 'Y' AND SKIM_ST_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND SKIM_ED_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY IDX DESC LIMIT 1
